overview:
Bryan Wilks is recognized by many as one of the best packaging consultants in North America. He has technical expertise in evaluating packaging properties. He holds packaging related patent and has invented plastic wiz( www.mypackapp.com). He is the lead marketing director of Clean Fill System. Over his career, he has exhibited excellence in sales and marketing and has resulted in remarkable growth in sales of the products for which he was responsible. He has utilized his knowledge and communication skills to make numerous industry speeches.

Bryan provides consulting in his field of expertise. He has provided consulting services for companies like The Boston Consulting Group, McKinsey & Company, Analysis Group, The Cambridge Group, Deloitte Consulting LLP, Oliver Wyman, AT Kearney, and Triage Consulting Group. He has valuable international connections to stay abreast with the latest products, developments and promotions in the field. For the past 10 years Wilks has assisted or worked for the marketing and sales organizations of numerous fortune 500 companies such as Tyco International, Whirlpool Corpartion, Pepsico, ITW, General Electric, Hewlett Packard, Weyerhauser, Safeway, Wal-Mart, Exxon Mobile, Home Depot, Cardinal Health, Boeing, Caterpillar, Lowes, Dow Chemical, Sunoco, Kraft Foods, Best Buy, Johnson Controls, Alcoa, DuPont, Tyson Foods, Delphi, and 3M.

Bryan has an interesting and successful life. In addition to making a difference in the packaging industry, Bryan travels the globe, has dined with the Queen of England, had the opportunity to work with former President George W. Bush, former Majority Leader Dick Armey, Prince Von Habsburg, and Morton Blackwell. He was selected as Tulsaâ„¢ Top 20 New Leaders 2008. Tulsa selects the most prominent and successful business executives with exemplified leadership qualities. He is blessed with a sweet family and a successful career.

Bryan holds an MBA from Stanford and a BA from Oklahoma Baptist University. He has exhibited excellence during his time at school. He received the President’s Award for exceptionally distinguished academic performance at Stanford. He received Coach C.L. Brigham Award for outstanding athletic & academic achievement at Oklahoma Baptist University. He was selected as a top graduate of the Harvard Business Program for Leadership Development. He continues his passion to learn and apply his knowledge to achieve excellence in technical and business domains.

milestones.description: Joined Victory Packaging as the Director of Flexible Packaging
Joined First Film in Montreal, Canada as the US Marketing Manager
Joined Allegis Group as National Account Manger
Appointed as the Executive Director of the Conservative Leadership Political Action Committee in Washington D.C.
Founder and CEO of Solutions Packaging
Invented PlasticWiz the first and most popular packaging app on the market
